definition: half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
erhua variant of 半分[ban4 fen1]

sentences.english: He express volumes to me smiling, eyes glitter but not flag.
sentences.chinese: 他意味深長的對我笑着，眼裏的兇光卻不減半分。

sentences.english: Like a complete darkness feelings, the end of not half sunshine.
sentences.chinese: 就像一段暗無天日的感情，終見不得半分陽光。

sentences.english: Department the south arose in the head of the Jue long approach half for minute of shut down.
sentences.chinese: 司南珏的腦子裏出現了長達半分鐘的當機。

sentences.english: The apples weigh six jin. Let's take them fifty-fifty.
sentences.chinese: 這些蘋果有6斤重，我們對半分吧。

sentences.english: For every mistake you make, you'll lose half a mark.
sentences.chinese: 你每犯一個錯誤，就要扣去半分。

sentences.english: It's really short, less than half a minute; just a piece of cake for you.
sentences.chinese: 視頻很短纔不到半分鐘，對你而言就是小菜一碟。

sentences.english: Then there remains only the alaya consciousness and half of the subtle functions of the manas.
sentences.chinese: 其中唯留阿賴耶識，全於末那半分微細。

sentences.english: When lord son say a words, where permit penny of half question objection.
sentences.chinese: 當主子的說一句話，哪裏容得半分反駁。

sentences.english: Although Daniel become a star, but no snub to Li Jun.
sentences.chinese: 丹尼爾雖然成了明星，卻對李君沒有怠慢半分。

sentences.english: Add in more oil into the frying pan and stir in the shrimps and cook for about half minute. Remove.
sentences.chinese: 炒鍋內再放入少許油燒熱，入蝦仁丁翻炒半分鐘勺起。

sentences.english: The applause rang out for more than half a minute.
When I held it for about half a minute, it twitched its legs.
sentences.chinese: 我抱了這大約半分鐘，它伸了伸腿。

sentences.english: The writing section is graded on a scale of 0-6, in half-point increments.
sentences.chinese: 寫作部分評分是0至6分，以半分爲基準遞增。

definition: one thread, one hair (idiom); a tiny bit/an iota
the slightest amount or degree/a bit
just the tiniest bit/a hint of
